titleStmt.title: A sermon preached April, 8. 1635 At a visitation at Brentvvood in Essex. By Alexander Read, Doctor of Divinitie, late fellow of Pembroke-Hall in Cambridge, now Parson of Fifield in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Read, Alexander, Doctor of Divinitie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by B. Alsop and T. Fawcet] for Iohn Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under St. Peters Church in Cornehill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop under St. Peters Church in Cornehill
